description: Fortnightly computer-marked quizzes covering weekly material with immediate feedback. Includes 9 graded quizzes (Weeks 1-9) and 3 ungraded revision quizzes.
45-minute computer-based test in Week 5 covering topics 1-3. Questions similar to weekly quizzes with instant marks and tutorial feedback.
45-minute computer-based test in Week 9 covering topics 4-6. Questions similar to weekly quizzes with instant marks and tutorial feedback.
2-hour comprehensive examination during official exam period covering all course content. Includes screen recording for academic integrity monitoring.
